review_data.title: leider nein
review_data.content: Sehr lange Wartezeit, unaufmerksamer Service. Essen und Wein mehrheitlich ungeniessbar. Kein Kaffee erhältlich. Ambiente gut.

review_data.title: Catch this pop up while you can!
review_data.content: Noisy and crowded, but it's all worth it for the great food and the atypical wine list. Servings are tapas sized, so it's possible to order EVERYTHING on the menu to share if there are 2 of you dining. And it's worth trying everything, as...More
